summary: Multi-page romantic website with 5 separate pages featuring navigation buttons, 9-photo gallery grid, interactive elements with moving buttons and animations, and Hinglish emotional content
architectural_notes: Pink/white gradient theme with heart emoji decorations
Responsive design with mobile viewport meta tag
Interactive JavaScript for button behaviors and animations
Soft pastel pink/white theme with warm golden glow effects
Mobile-first responsive design with large readable fonts
Modular photo gallery with easy image replacement capability
5-page structure: Landing, Memories (9-photo grid), Understanding, One Chance (with embedded mini game), Final
3x3 photo grid layout on Memories page with 9 placeholders and individual captions
imageRequirements:

- Romantic couple photo placeholder with soft pink overlay (memory-1.dim_300x300.jpg)
- Romantic couple photo placeholder with soft pink overlay (memory-2.dim_300x300.jpg)
- Romantic couple photo placeholder with soft pink overlay (memory-3.dim_300x300.jpg)
- Romantic couple photo placeholder with soft pink overlay (memory-4.dim_300x300.jpg)
- Romantic couple photo placeholder with soft pink overlay (memory-5.dim_300x300.jpg)
- Romantic couple photo placeholder with soft pink overlay (memory-6.dim_300x300.jpg)
- Romantic couple photo placeholder with soft pink overlay (memory-7.dim_300x300.jpg)
- Romantic couple photo placeholder with soft pink overlay (memory-8.dim_300x300.jpg)
- Romantic couple photo placeholder with soft pink overlay (memory-9.dim_300x300.jpg)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page romantic landing page with a pink gradient background (from #ffe6f0 to white) and center-aligned content structure
Implement the hero section with heading 'Hey [Her Name]‚Ä¶ Main Humse Give Up Nahi Kar Raha ‚ù§Ô∏è' and subtext 'Mujhe pata hai tum hurt ho‚Ä¶ par main effort dena chahta hoon.'
Create a photo gallery section titled 'Hamari Beautiful Story' with 3 placeholder images (200x200px each, rounded corners) and caption 'Tum meri peace ho ü§ç'
Add understanding section with heading 'Main Samajh Raha Hoon' and three lines of apologetic text explaining acknowledgment of past mistakes and commitment to prove through actions
Create action buttons section titled 'Ek Chance‚Ä¶ Pyaar Ke Naam ü§ç' with two styled buttons: 'Let's Try Again ‚ù§Ô∏è' (pink background) and 'Mujhe Thoda Time Chahiye ü§ç' (gray background)

Implement interactive question section with heading 'Important Question üòå', question text 'Kya tum abhi bhi mujhse pyaar karti ho?', a 'No' button that moves to random positions on hover, and a 'Yes' button labeled 'Haan Obviously ‚ù§Ô∏è'

When the 'Yes' button is clicked, display the message 'Mujhe pata tha ‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you for giving us a chance.' below the buttons and trigger an animation of 20 floating heart emojis (‚ù§Ô∏è) that rise from bottom to top of viewport over 5 seconds
Add closing section with heading 'Main Aaj Bhi Tumhe Choose Karta Hoon.' and text 'Breakup solution nahi hota. Effort solution hota hai. Aur main ready hoon ü§ç'

Apply consistent styling across all sections: Segoe UI font family, 60px top/bottom padding and 20px horizontal padding per section, pink headings (#ff4d88), and smooth transitions (0.3s) on interactive elements

Implement React Router for multi-page navigation structure with routes for 6 separate pages: Landing (/), Memories (/memories), Understanding (/understanding), One Chance (/one-chance), Cute Game (/question), and Final Page (/final)

Create Landing Page (/) component with heading 'Hey Tannu üå∑‚Ä¶ Mainn Give Up Nahi Kar Raha ‚ù§Ô∏è', subtext 'Mujhe pata hai tum hurt ho‚Ä¶ par main effort dena chahta hoon.', and a prominent button labeled 'Please ek baar padh lo ü•∫' that navigates to the Memories page

Create Memories Page (/memories) component with title 'Hamari Beautiful memories', photo gallery layout with 3 placeholder images that are easy to replace, three captions ('Tum meri peace ho.', 'Main tumhe akela feel nahi hone dunga.', 'Jo humne banaya hai woh special hai.'), Back button to Landing page, and Next button to Understanding page

Create Understanding Page (/understanding) component with title 'Main Samajh Raha Hoon', three paragraphs of text ('Agar tumhe kabhi laga ki tum akeli effort kar rahi ho‚Ä¶ I'm sorry.', 'Tum consistency aur security dono deserve karti ho.', 'Main words nahi, actions se prove karna chahta hoon.'), Back button to Memories page, and Next button to One Chance page

Create One Chance Page (/one-chance) component with title 'Ek Chance‚Ä¶ Pyaar Ke Naam ü§ç', four lines of text ('Main pressure nahi de raha.', 'Bas ek real chance maang raha hoon.', 'Try karne se sab ho jata hai.', 'Is baar effort pura hoga.'), two action buttons ('Let's Try Again ‚ù§Ô∏è' and 'Mujhe Thoda Time Chahiye ü§ç'), and Next button to question page

Create Cute Game Page (/question) component with title 'Important Question üòå', question text 'Kya tum abhi bhi mujhse pyaar karti ho?', two interactive buttons: 'Nahi üò°' (shows popup message 'Sach me? Soch lo phir se üòè' on click) and 'Haan Obviously ‚ù§Ô∏è' (shows glowing message 'Mujhe pata tha ‚ù§Ô∏è' and triggers floating heart animation on click), and Next button to Final page

Create Final Page (/final) component with large glowing text 'Main Aaj Bhi Tumhe Choose Karta Hoon.', three lines of subtext ('Breakup solution nahi hota.', 'Effort solution hota hai.', 'Aur main ready hoon.'), soft romantic background, and small heart animation that plays on page load

Apply consistent theme across all pages: soft pastel pink and white color scheme, warm golden glow effects, subtle floating hearts background animation, large readable fonts (minimum 18px body text), mobile-friendly responsive design, and clean centered layout with adequate spacing

Refactor existing component files (HeroSection, GallerySection, UnderstandingSection, ActionButtonsSection, QuestionSection, ClosingSection) to work within the new multi-page structure, ensuring each component integrates into its corresponding page route

Organize photo gallery placeholder images in frontend/public/assets directory with clear naming (memory-1.jpg, memory-2.jpg, memory-3.jpg) to make it easy for users to replace them with their own photos

Expand the Memories Page (/memories) photo gallery from 3 photos to exactly 9 photos displayed in a 3x3 grid layout with individual captions for each photo: 1. 'Tum meri peace ho.', 2. 'Main tumhe akela feel nahi hone dunga.', 3. 'Jo humne banaya hai woh special hai.', 4. 'Har moment tumhare saath important hai.', 5. 'Tum meri safe place ho.', 6. 'Hum perfect nahi, par real hain.', 7. 'Tumhare bina sab adhura lagta hai.', 8. 'Yeh sab yaadein mere liye priceless hain.', 9. 'Main yeh sab lose nahi karna chahta.'

Add a mini game section below the action buttons on the One Chance page with the question 'Kya tum mujhe ek chance dogi?' and two interactive buttons: 'Nahi üò°' (which moves slightly and shows the playful message 'Sach me? Soch lo phir se üòè' when clicked) and 'Haan ‚ù§Ô∏è' (which shows the glowing message 'Mujhe pata tha ‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you for trusting us.' and triggers floating hearts animation when clicked)
Update the Understanding page text from 'Main words nahi, actions se prove karna chahta hoon.' to 'Main sirf bolna nahi‚Ä¶ actions se prove karna chahta hoon.'

Update the Final page subtext to include three additional lines: 'Na pressure.', 'Na ego.', 'Bas pyaar aur consistency.' after the existing lines 'Breakup solution nahi hota.', 'Effort solution hota hai.', 'Aur main ready hoon.'

Update the Landing page heading from 'Hey Tannu üå∑‚Ä¶ Mainn Give Up Nahi Kar Raha ‚ù§Ô∏è' to 'Hey tannu üå∑‚Ä¶ Main Give Up Nahi Kar Raha ‚ù§Ô∏è' (change 'Tannu' to lowercase 'tannu' and 'Mainn' to 'Main')
Update the Memories page title from 'Hamari Beautiful memories' to 'Hamari Beautiful Story' (capitalize 'Story')

Organize 9 photo placeholder images in the frontend/public/assets directory with clear sequential naming (memory-1.jpg through memory-9.jpg) to make it easy for users to replace them with their own photos

new_feature_requests.summary: Expand Memories page to display exactly 9 photos in a 3x3 grid layout with individual captions for each photo
Restructure site to 5 pages instead of 6: Landing, Memories, Understanding, One Chance (with mini game), and Final
Update One Chance page to include both action buttons AND mini game section on same page
Add interaction where 'Let's Try Again' button shows glowing 'I Love You üíã' message with floating hearts
Make 'Mujhe Thoda Time Chahiye' button move slightly when clicked
Add mini game below action buttons with question 'Kya tum mujhe ek chance dogi?' and interactive Yes/No buttons
Update Understanding page text to include 'actions se prove karna chahta hoon' instead of just 'prove karna chahta hoon'
Update Final page subtext to include 'Na pressure. Na ego. Bas pyaar aur consistency.'
